City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 4:00 pm
* Regular City Council Meetings are scheduled on the 2nd Monday of the month unless if falls on an observed holiday or the meeting date was moved at the request of the Mayor.
* City Hall  
  200 Rusk Street  
  City Council Chambers  
  Pittsburg, TX 75686

Special meetings are held when needed.

Agendas, Minutes & Videos
-------------------------

Agendas are posted on the front window of City Hall and on this website on the Friday preceding each meeting.

* [**Request for an item to appear on the City Council agenda.**](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1248)
* [**Request for Public Comment**](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1288)
* **[Rules of Procedure for council meetings](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/1269)**

[View Agendas](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/267/Agendas) || [View Minutes](https://www.pittsburgtx.gov/DocumentCenter/Index/55)

Overview
--------

The City council represents and serves our community as responsible stewards of the public trust. We envision and shape our future by engaging citizen involvement and fostering City staff innovation.

### Council / City Manager Government

Pittsburg has a Council/City Manager form of Government. The City Council is composed of a Mayor and five members elected at-large for three-year terms. They are the policy-making body of the City's government and set and adopt the annual budget for the City.
